member.name: T:IndianHealthService.BMXNet.DServerInfo
member.summary: Prompts for RPMS Server address and port Obtains current values, if any, from isolated storage and uses them as defaults. If OK, then writes values to isolated storage and returns Address and Port as properties.

member.name: T:IndianHealthService.BMXNet.BMXNetLib
member.summary: BMXNetLib implements low-level socket connectivity to RPMS databases. The VA RPC Broker must be running on the RPMS server in order for BMXNetLib to connect.

member.name: M:IndianHealthService.BMXNet.BMXNetLib.#ctor
member.summary: Main constructor with default machine encoding

member.name: M:IndianHealthService.BMXNet.BMXNetLib.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Constructor specifiying encoding
member.param: String name of character set

member.name: M:IndianHealthService.BMXNet.BMXNetLib.PieceLength(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Corresponds to M's $L(STRING,DELIMITER)

member.name: M:IndianHealthService.BMXNet.BMXNetLib.Piece(System.String,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Corresponds to M's $$Piece function

member.name: M:IndianHealthService.BMXNet.BMXNetLib.ADEBLDPadString(System.String)
member.summary: Given strInput = "13" builds "013" if nLength = 3. Default for nLength is 3.

member.name: M:IndianHealthService.BMXNet.BMXNetLib.ADEBLDPadString(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Given strInput = "13" builds "013" if nLength = 3 Default for nLength is 3.
member.param: Default = 3

member.name: M:IndianHealthService.BMXNet.BMXNetLib.ADEBLDB(System.String)
member.summary: Concatenates zero-padded length of sInput to sInput Given "Hello" returns "004Hello" If nSize = 5, returns "00004Hello" Default for nSize is 3.

member.name: M:IndianHealthService.BMXNet.BMXNetLib.ADEBLDB(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Concatenates zero-padded length of sInput to sInput Given "Hello" returns "004Hello" If nSize = 5, returns "00004Hello" Default for nSize is 3.

member.name: M:IndianHealthService.BMXNet.BMXNetLib.ADEBHDR(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Build protocol header

member.name: M:IndianHealthService.BMXNet.BMXNetLib.FindSubString(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Returns index of first instance of sSubString in sString. If sSubString not found, returns -1.

member.name: M:IndianHealthService.BMXNet.BMXNetLib.Lock(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Lock a local or global M variable Returns true if lock is obtained during TimeOut seconds Use + to increment, - to decrement lock.

member.name: P:IndianHealthService.BMXNet.BMXNetLib.BMXRWL
member.summary: Returns a reference to the internal ReaderWriterLock member.

member.name: P:IndianHealthService.BMXNet.BMXNetLib.RWLTimeout
member.summary: Sets and returns the timeout in milliseconds for locking the transmit port. If the transmit port is unavailable an ApplicationException will be thrown.

member.name: P:IndianHealthService.BMXNet.BMXNetLib.ReceiveTimeout
member.summary: Set and retrieve the timeout, in milliseconds, to receive a response from the RPMS server. If the retrieve time exceeds the timeout, an exception will be thrown and the connection will be closed. The default is 30 seconds.

member.name: P:IndianHealthService.BMXNet.BMXNetLib.AppContext
member.summary: Gets/sets the Kernel Application context Throws an exception if unable to set the context.

member.summary: Gets or Sets the Default Encoder to use

member.name: T:IndianHealthService.BMXNet.BMXNetConnectInfo
member.summary: Contains methods and properties to support RPMS Login for .NET applications

member.name: M:IndianHealthService.BMXNet.BMXNetConnectInfo.#ctor
member.summary: BMXNetConnector With Default Encoding (invokes BMXNetLib)

member.name: M:IndianHealthService.BMXNet.BMXNetConnectInfo.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: BMXNetConnector with a specific encoding
member.param: String representation of encoding (e.g. windows-1256 for arabic). If encoding is not found, we fall back to the default windows encoding. A debug message is printed to that effect.

member.name: M:IndianHealthService.BMXNet.BMXNetConnectInfo.SubscribeEvent(System.String)
member.summary: Register interest in an RPMS event.

member.name: M:IndianHealthService.BMXNet.BMXNetConnectInfo.UnSubscribeEvent(System.String)
member.summary: Unregister an RPMS event

member.name: M:IndianHealthService.BMXNet.BMXNetConnectInfo.RaiseEvent(System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Raise an RPMS event
member.param: The name of the event to raise
Parameters associated with the event
True if the event should be raised back to the caller

member.name: M:IndianHealthService.BMXNet.BMXNetConnectInfo.Login
member.summary: For backwards compatibility. Internally calls LoadConnectInfo()

member.name: M:IndianHealthService.BMXNet.BMXNetConnectInfo.ChangeServerInfo
member.summary: Change the internet address and port of the RPMS server Throws a BMXNetException if user cancels

member.name: M:IndianHealthService.BMXNet.BMXNetConnectInfo.LoadConnectInfo
member.summary: Called to connect to an M server Server address, port, Access and Verify codes will be prompted for depending on whether these values are cached.

member.name: M:IndianHealthService.BMXNet.BMXNetConnectInfo.LoadConnectInfo(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Called to connect to the M server specified by server address and listener port. The default namespace on the server will be used. Access and Verify codes will be prompted if valid values for the current Windows Identity are not cached on the server.
member.param: The IP address or name of the MServer
The port on which the BMXNet Monitor is listening

member.name: M:IndianHealthService.BMXNet.BMXNetConnectInfo.LoadConnectInfo(System.String,System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Called to connect to the M server specified by server address, listener port and namespace. Access and Verify codes will be prompted if valid values for the current Windows Identity are not cached on the server.
member.param: The IP address or name of the MServer
The port on which the BMXNet Monitor is listening
The namespace in which the BMXNet application will run

member.name: M:IndianHealthService.BMXNet.BMXNetConnectInfo.LoadConnectInfo(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Called to connect to an M server using specific Access and Verify codes. Server address and port will be prompted if they are not cached in local storage.
member.param: The user's access code
The user's verify code

member.name: M:IndianHealthService.BMXNet.BMXNetConnectInfo.LoadConnectInfo(System.String,System.Int32,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Called to connect to a specific M server using specific Access and Verify codes.
member.param: The user's access code
The user's verify code
The IP address or name of the MServer
The port on which the BMXNet Monitor is listening

member.name: M:IndianHealthService.BMXNet.BMXNetConnectInfo.LoadConnectInfo(System.String,System.Int32,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Called to connect to a specific namespace on the M server using specific Access and Verify codes.
member.param: The user's access code
The user's verify code
The IP address or name of the MServer
The port on which the BMXNet Monitor is listening
The namespace in which the BMXNet application will run

member.name: M:IndianHealthService.BMXNet.BMXNetConnectInfo.RPMSDataTable(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Creates and names a DataTable using the command in CommandString and the name in TableName.
member.param: The SQL or RPC call
The name of the resulting table

member.name: M:IndianHealthService.BMXNet.BMXNetConnectInfo.RPMSDataTable(System.String,System.String,System.Data.DataSet)
member.summary: Creates and names a DataTable using the command in CommandString and the name in TableName then adds it to DataSet.
member.param: The SQL or RPC call
The name of the resulting table
The dataset in which to place the table

member.name: P:IndianHealthService.BMXNet.BMXNetConnectInfo.EventPollingEnabled
member.summary: Enables and disables event polling for the RPMS connection

member.name: P:IndianHealthService.BMXNet.BMXNetConnectInfo.EventPollingInterval
member.summary: Sets and retrieves the interval in milliseconds for RPMS event polling

member.name: P:IndianHealthService.BMXNet.BMXNetConnectInfo.AutoFire
member.summary: Sets and retrieves the number of times that the Event Timer will generage a BMXNet AutoFire event. For example, if AutoFire == 3, then every 3rd time the Event Timer fires, it will generate an AutoFire event.

member.name: P:IndianHealthService.BMXNet.BMXNetConnectInfo.ReceiveTimeout
member.summary: Set and retrieve the timeout, in milliseconds, to receive a response from the RPMS server. If the retrieve time exceeds the timeout, an exception will be thrown and the connection will be closed. The default is 30 seconds.

member.summary: Returns a string representation of DUZ

member.summary: Sets and Returns DUZ(2)

member.summary: Gets the address of the RPMS Server

member.summary: Gets the port on which the MServer is connected
